member.name: DWRITE_FONT_FILE_TYPE
member.summary: The type of a font represented by a single font file. Font formats that consist of multiple files, for example Type 1 .PFM and .PFB, have separate enum values for each of the file types.

member.name: DWRITE_FONT_FILE_TYPE.DWRITE_FONT_FILE_TYPE_UNKNOWN
member.summary: Font type is not recognized by the DirectWrite font system.

member.name: DWRITE_FONT_FILE_TYPE.DWRITE_FONT_FILE_TYPE_TRUETYPE_COLLECTION
member.summary: OpenType font that contains a TrueType collection.
